caption: Discovery Detail
description: The Discovery Detail object describes discovery results of a data classification job.
name: discovery_detail

count.description: The number of discovered information of the specified type.

occurrence_detail.description: Details about where in the target file the information was discovered. The information will differ based on the type of the target file.

type.description: The specific type of information that was discovered. e.g. name, phone_number, etc.

value.description: Optionally, the specific value of discovered information.
